name: aquarius
text: Temperamental, uncompromising, stubborn, aloof, with a propensity to run away from emotional expression. You tend not to get along with those that disagree with you, kind of like Miss Hopkins...

name: pisces
text: Weak-willed, over-sensitive, pessimistic and lazy. You are often found to be moaning and complaining. Here is a well-known Piscean role-model for you to aspire to:

name: aries
text: Impatient, moody, short-tempered, impulsive and aggressive. Are you sure your last name isn't Kardashian?!

name: taurus
text: Stubborn, possessive and uncompromising. The stars tell us that despite being an excellent cook, gardener and lover, you hold a severe dislike for rushed decision-making and synthetic fabrics...just like Boris?!

name: cancer
text: Moody, pessimistic, suspicious, manipulative, insecure. The stars tell us that you dislike people knowing your business and that your prefer to stay out of the spotlight, much like this one...

name: leo
text: Arrogant, stubborn, self-centered, lazy and inflexible. No amount of witchcraft and wizardry could turn your frown upside down...

name: libra
text: You are indescisive, self-pitying and enjoy holding a grudge. You particularly enjoy laughing with friends and skipping through fields of wheat.

name: virgo
text: You are shy, always worrying, overly critical of others and are not able to balance work and play.

name: scorpio
text: Distrusting, jealous, secretive and violent. You share a star sign with one of YouTube's biggest stars. No idea who she is? Us neither...

name: sagitarius
text: You are impatient, undiplomatic, and unpredictable. Can often be found off the rails...

name: capricorn
text: You are the living embodiment of this years hottest couple: KimYe.
